name: Plants Vs Ghouls
body:
## 1.0.0 Alpha 22
- Init scale fix.
- Button fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 21
- Frame level updates.
- Model fixes. (Ghouls)
- More scale fix.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 20
- Main menu is now properly rescaleable.
- Fixed an issue with Ghoul eating.
- Some button fixes.
- More scale fixes.
- Some other fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 19
- Main menu is now properly rescaleable.
- Fixed an issue with Ghoul eating.
- Some button fixes.
- More scale fixes.
- Some other fixes.
- Scale fixes for different UIScales.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 18
- Sun system preparations.
- You can return to the current game after you closed the game too.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 17
- Sky fix.
- Hided Ghouls when they're off the frame.
- Added debug frames.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 16
- Added ingame menu.
- Added Ready-Set-Plant! animation.
- More minor fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 15
- Added main menu.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 14
- Renamed textures.
- More upvalues.
- Pause button tweak up.
- Some other minor fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 13
- Game can be paused/resumed.
- The game frame is now moveable.
- Animation preparations for level 1.
- A lot of other smaller fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 12
- More Slots!
- Smaller fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 11
- Slot changes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 10
- Added cooldowns to Plants!
- Minor fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 9
- Added a new type of spiked Ghoul!

## 1.0.0 Alpha 8
- Added another type of faster and stroger Ghoul!
- Ghouls have random skins.
- More optimisations.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 7
- More Ghouls!
- Some optimisations.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 6
- Ghoul animation fixes.
- Plants have random sizes. (+15% max)
- You can see which Plant the the Ghouls are eating!

## 1.0.0 Alpha 5
- Ghouls can eat plants now!

## 1.0.0 Alpha 4
- Plant degree fix.
- Some other minor fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 3
- Minor fixes, optimisations.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 2
- Animation fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 1
- First release.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
